1.title: Episode #3.1

episode of.title: The Allen and Craig Show (TV Series 2008– )

1.plot: Craig thinks Allen has a genital disease and tries to uncover the truth. Meanwhile Allen's next attempt at getting famous includes making an episode of "Man vs. Burbs".

2.title: Episode #3.2

episode of.title: The Allen and Craig Show (TV Series 2008– )

2.plot: Allen comes down with a case of amnesia which causes him to become a completely different person. Now Craig must try and get the old Allen back.

3.title: Episode #3.3

episode of.title: The Allen and Craig Show (TV Series 2008– )

3.plot: Allen's next attempt at getting famous involves turning him and Craig into professional athletes. Things soon spiral out of control though when Allen changes his diet plan.

4.title: Episode #3.4

episode of.title: The Allen and Craig Show (TV Series 2008– )

4.plot: When Craig spooks Allen with a card trick Allen becomes convinced that dark forces follow Craig around. Now Allen wants to harness the magical powers to show the world what he is capable of.

5.title: Episode #3.5

episode of.title: The Allen and Craig Show (TV Series 2008– )

5.plot: After a break in at Craigs house from a mental patient, Allen and Craig train to become super hero's. Soon after Allen begins to break down becoming too desperate for achieving fame, and comes up with a plan so twisted it just might work.

1.title: Episode #1.1

episode of.title: The Allen and Craig Show (TV Series 2008– )

1.plot: Allen drags his best friend Craig into starting a web show to make it famous on You Tube. But first they need to come up with a clever name for their new show and think of something people will want to watch.

2.title: Episode #1.2

episode of.title: The Allen and Craig Show (TV Series 2008– )

2.plot: Allen decides to continue on making the show and his next attempt at getting famous is to do some stunt work, which will include throwing Craig off the roof of his house.

3.title: Episode #1.3

episode of.title: The Allen and Craig Show (TV Series 2008– )

3.plot: While trying to find a worthy cameraman, Allen seeks revenge on Craig for not getting injured in the last episode.

4.title: Episode #1.4

episode of.title: The Allen and Craig Show (TV Series 2008– )

4.plot: Allen is not happy over the shows lack of You Tube views, so he devises a plan to break world records. This way the whole world will want to watch the show.

5.title: Episode #1.5

episode of.title: The Allen and Craig Show (TV Series 2008– )

5.plot: If the show gets popular Allen and Craig will be swarmed with fan girls, this is a problem because Craig is terrified of women. Allen attempts to help conquer his fear all the while avoiding a male stalker of theirs.

6.title: Episode #1.6

episode of.title: The Allen and Craig Show (TV Series 2008– )

6.plot: Allen believes the reason the show is not huge yet is because him and Craig are not sex icons, so he hires a personal trainer to help fix that problem.

7.title: Episode #1.7

episode of.title: The Allen and Craig Show (TV Series 2008– )

7.plot: A mysterious man decides to help Craig get revenge on Allen for always being so mean to him.

8.title: Episode #1.8

episode of.title: The Allen and Craig Show (TV Series 2008– )

8.plot: When Allen converts into a Jehovah's Witness to pick up a girl he becomes afraid Craig might become even more lame without him around so he hires a friend from school to look after him.

9.title: Episode #1.9

episode of.title: The Allen and Craig Show (TV Series 2008– )

9.plot: Allen searches for Craig's replacement on the show, but soon realizes he needs Craig more than he thought.

10.title: Episode #1.10

episode of.title: The Allen and Craig Show (TV Series 2008– )

10.plot: Allen kidnaps Craig and forces him to go on a road trip to Hollywood.

11.title: Episode #1.11

episode of.title: The Allen and Craig Show (TV Series 2008– )

11.plot: Craig attempts to flee the show by moving to the city, Allen follows him and tries to convince him to move back home.

1.title: Episode #2.1

episode of.title: The Allen and Craig Show (TV Series 2008– )

1.plot: Allen drags Craig to a college to find a party and make it popular in a local scene.

2.title: Episode #2.2

episode of.title: The Allen and Craig Show (TV Series 2008– )

2.plot: When Allen and Craig lose their cameraman they do their best to film an episode by themselves. Meanwhile the cameraman simply tries to survive the night on his own.

3.title: Episode #2.3

episode of.title: The Allen and Craig Show (TV Series 2008– )

3.plot: Allen thinks he can finally make it big by going ghost hunting, however Craig is terrified of the paranormal.

4.title: Episode #2.4

episode of.title: The Allen and Craig Show (TV Series 2008– )

4.plot: Craig gets seriously injured filming one of Allen's stunts, then Allen decides to play doctor.

5.title: Episode #2.5

episode of.title: The Allen and Craig Show (TV Series 2008– )

5.plot: When Craig gets an online girlfriend, Allen plots to destroy the relationship so Craig will focus on the show.

6.title: Episode #2.6

episode of.title: The Allen and Craig Show (TV Series 2008– )

6.plot: Allen tricks Craig into attending a local music festival in an attempt to start a band.

7.title: Episode #2.7

episode of.title: The Allen and Craig Show (TV Series 2008– )

7.plot: In another attempt to become famous, Allen writes and directs his own movie and forces Craig to take part in it.

8.title: Episode #2.8

episode of.title: The Allen and Craig Show (TV Series 2008– )

8.plot: Allen attempts to become a famous chef but instead slices off his finger, now it is a race against the clock to find it so he can go to the hospital and have it re-attached.

9.title: Episode #2.9

episode of.title: The Allen and Craig Show (TV Series 2008– )

9.plot: Allen and Craig deal with a couple bullies in the neighborhood who disrupt them while they try to film a new episode.

10.title: Episode #2.10

episode of.title: The Allen and Craig Show (TV Series 2008– )

10.plot: Allen has an idea to get famous and it involves going to Wisconsin. When the two get lost in the wrong state (Texas) Craig falls in love with a beautiful girl and Allen loses a precious item.

imdb.plot outline: The series is about Allen and Craig trying to get famous via You tube. Each episode follows them doing a different scenario to get famous like creating a band, making a movie, stunts, sports and so on. However due to lack of experience and conflicting personalities the goals never have a hope of being successful.
imdb.title: The Allen and Craig Show
akas: The Allen and Craig Show (United States)
plot: Allen drags his best friend Craig into creating a web show with the hopes of making it famous.::Craig Deering

The series is about Allen and Craig trying to get famous via You tube. Each episode follows them doing a different scenario to get famous like creating a band, making a movie, stunts, sports and so on. However due to lack of experience and conflicting personalities the goals never have a hope of being successful.::Evil Iguana Productions
